instagram.idea: Product post: 'Introducing Our New Spicy Chicken Sandwich' - highlighting features and promotions
instagram.visual_description: A high-quality image of the new Spicy Chicken Sandwich, with the sandwich as the main focus, on a clean background, with a side of fries and a drink in the corner, and the KFC logo on top
instagram.full_post_text:
Get ready to ignite your taste buds!

Introducing Our New Spicy Chicken Sandwich! 
Made with our signature hand-breaded chicken filet, topped with spicy mayo and served on a toasted bun. 
For a limited time, try it out and get a free side of fries with purchase!

ðŸ‘‡ Try it now and tag a friend who can handle the heat!
